text: Language and Mind is a 1968 book of three essays on linguistics by Noam Chomsky. An expanded edition in 1972 added three essays and a new preface. == References == == Bibliography == * == Further reading == * * * * * Category:1968 non-fiction books Category:Books by Noam Chomsky Category:English-language books Category:Harcourt (publisher) books Category:Linguistics books
title: Language and Mind
